questions.question: A financial institution has developed a new fraud detection model. Because of the high-stakes nature of the application, they want to thoroughly evaluate the model's performance and impact before fully deploying it.Which benefit of A/B testing would be most relevant in this scenario?
options: Continuous monitoring for performance degradation or concept drift
Realistic performance evaluation in a production-like environment
Increased stakeholder confidence and trust in the deployed model
correct_answers: Realistic performance evaluation in a production-like environment
questions.topic: 4.1 Monitor Model Performance and Data Quality
